dublinCore.dc:title: 119 S2103 IS: Healthy Food Financing Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mrs. Gillibrand (for herself, Mr. Fetterman, Mr. Blumenthal, Mr. King, Ms. Smith, Mr. Warner, Mr. Schiff, Mr. Booker, and Mr. Durbin) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry

form.official-title: To amend the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 to authorize mandatory funding for the Healthy Food Financing Initiative.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Healthy Food Financing Initiative Reauthorization Act of 2025.
Section 243 of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 6953) is amended by striking subsection (d) and inserting the following:

subsection.text: Of the funds of the Commodity Credit Corporation, the Secretary shall use to carry out this sectionâ€”

paragraph.text: $50,000,000 for fiscal year 2029 and each fiscal year thereafter.
